name: tho_maz
description:
Our princess has been kidnapped by a demonic wizard. Mike is not the first one who tries to save her; but he will be the last! Play against the enemies which getting harder each level, and defeat the wizard to get the princess. Also includes a secondary mode to collect beets, and a co-op mode to do this with a friend.

Features:
  • More than 30 levels to play.
  • More than 4 enemy types.
  • A co-op mode to play the secondary mode with a friend.
